name: testDragAndDropAppointment
description: Change appointment time by drag and drop in UI
descriptionHtml: Change appointment time by drag and drop in UI

testStage.description: Change appointment time by drag and drop in UI

steps.name: Preconditions: change calendar view -> get calendar settings ->delete all appointments -> create client & service

steps.name: matcher: extract value from response HTML

parameters.name: response
client
parameters.value: ClientCreateRequest(is_filling_up_sent=false, status=WaGmLN3Ado, permitAds=true, birthdate=10-01, birthyear=1965, address=370 Scot Burgs, North Bobbyemouth, NH 55226, debts=[{"date":"2023-05-08 14:30:07","desc":"8tck__pKvm","sum":2019075372}], phone=["0507-41-91-41"], email=grazyna.lebsack@yahoo.com, notes=[{"added":"2023-05-08 14:30:07","text":"hwmCAm9yil"}], name=Jay McClure, gender=female)

steps.name: API: get appointment IDs before dragging

assertThatList '[AppointmentGetRequest(offTime=null, note=null, address=null, birthdate=null, totalPrice=null, addedDate=null, permitAds=false, isConfirmed=false, start=2023-05-08 12:00, isUnsubscribed=false, isBookedRemotely=false, profilePicture=null, services=[], clientId=-1, thankingSmsId=null, reminderSmsId=null, phone=null, clientName=null, end=2023-05-08 13:00, appointmentID=265, phoneCanonical=null, isRecurring=false, status=null)]'

assertThat '[AppointmentGetRequest(offTime=null, note=null, address=null, birthdate=null, totalPrice=null, addedDate=null, permitAds=false, isConfirmed=false, start=2023-05-08 12:00, isUnsubscribed=false, isBookedRemotely=false, profilePicture=null, services=[], clientId=-1, thankingSmsId=null, reminderSmsId=null, phone=null, clientName=null, end=2023-05-08 13:00, appointmentID=265, phoneCanonical=null, isRecurring=false, status=null)]'
